Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns correct response which is absolutely right. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns correct response with empty 'ImagingSettings' tag in 'GetImagingSettingsResponse'. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Incorrect response for 3th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns incorrect response for 'GetCapabilities'[Imaging] command. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Incorrect response for 4th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns incorrect response for 'GetCapabilities'[Media] command. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Incorrect response for 5th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns incorrect response for 'GetVideoSources' command. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Incorrect response for 6th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns incorrect response for 'GetImagingSettings' command. (With Date and Time synchronization) {Make incorrect response in the code}

Test.Name: Fault response for 3th request

Test.Name: Fault response for 6th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns fault response message 'ActionNotSupported/NoImagingForSource' for 'GetImagingSettings' command. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Fault response for 6th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns fault response message 'ActionNotSupported' for 'GetImagingSettings' command. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Fault response for 6th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns other fault response for 'GetImagingSettings' command. (With Date and Time synchronization)

Test.Name: Fault response for 6th request
Test.Description: Check IMAGING COMMAND GETIMAGESETTINGS test when DUT returns incorrect fault response message for 'GetImagingSettings' command. (With Date and Time synchronization) {Make incorrect response in the code}
